meaningMnemonic: 散る is "to be scattered." This is when you're doing the scattering. You know that because you're causing a <reading>ruckus</reading> (らかす) from all the scattering of money you're doing, down on the people below.
readingMnemonic: The reading of the 散 comes from 散る. So, go ahead and scatter more memories around your brain, you got this already.
